inputs.name: branchesToTest
inputs.label: Branch(es) to Test Merge
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch(es) to test merge into this build's repo branch (set in the Repository settings). Comma separate if there are multiple.

inputs.name: targetBranch
inputs.label: Target Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The branch to merge the build branch into.

inputs.name: sourceCommitId
inputs.label: Commit Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Commit id of the source branch. If not specified, the build's commit id will be used

inputs.name: remoteName
inputs.label: Name of this remote
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of this remote in the Git repo.

inputs.name: pat
inputs.label: PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: Personal Access Token for repo access. Only required if this task is used in a Release (not required in Builds). For builds, enable OAuth token.
